creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: I can’t say I am surprised that our Great Leader is having a hard time distinguishing between the concepts of good and bad. Here is a quick reference chart covering some basics. I am sure the pursuit of ethics will always be a mystery to the Regime, so, hoping the language is not too complicated.
title: August 20, 2020: Morality Demystified.
